function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Uncertainty around consumer acceptance of technology-based innovations may lead to resistance and hesitancy in adopting new digital mobility","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ambient conditions of physical servicescape, including background music and noise levels","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Psychological reactance leading to anti-social behavior such as increased touching of products.","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of physical servicescape changes on customer experience cx due to pandemic challenges","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced social interaction due to technology-mediated solutions","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shoppers may feel on edge and try to keep a distance from other shoppers and employees.","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long queues at the store entrance may increase fear of contamination and negative feelings.","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased store crowding can lead to fear of contamination and decreased customer
